channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 23rd May
item.description:
ROCKING KERB PLEASE LIFT AND REPLACE X1. 450MM X 130MM X 25MM KERB. STATS REQUIRED (FW Kerbing Defects)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water logged pedestrian crossing, 23rd May
item.description:
Pedestrian crossing on a435/old stoke road. The road was resurfaced in the last couple of weeks, the crossing always floods, since the resurfacing it is worse as the removed the drain/gully. Pedestrians cannot cross here after the heavy rain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Junction into Chapman way from Almar Road just by the post box .

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd May
item.description:
Tree is growing over the customers garden and hanging onto the cables, putting pressure on the cables. Customer s worried the live cables are going to snap. Can tree be cut back.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water flowing from drain outside Endsleigh Insurance building., 22nd May
item.description:
Drain outside Endsleigh on Shurdington Road A46 Severn Trent have provided a ref IRF 00010. Not them responsible for unblocking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Dangerous, very large overhanging branches., 22nd May
item.description:
Series of large oak tree branches above Langley Road. Some branches have recently fallen. Need tree surgeon assessment urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several blocked drains causing massive puddle, 22nd May
item.description:
There are a number of blocked drains at the junction of Cleeveland Street and St Pauls Road. With heavy rain a very large puddle forms splashing pedestrians as cars cannot avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Cleeveland Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 22nd May
item.description:
